name: Bubble Bash!
description:
What is the game about?

It is a 4 player couch-co-op multiplayer game, where each player controls a blob, and shoots bubbles at their opponents. Each bubble grows your enemy in size, eventually killing them. But, it also shrinks you down.

Best played with 4 players, can be played with 2 to 4 players

Credits:
